      • addVehicles

        public void addVehicles()
        Description copied from class: Simulator
        This iterates through all vehicles. If the simulation time (Simulator.time) has passed the vehicle's departure time, the vehicle is added to its starting link.
        Overrides:
        addVehicles in class Simulator
